question: Which of the following is not true about National Electronic Funds Transfer (NEFT) system?
option1: There is no limit on transaction through NEFT
option3: NEFT is a payment system which facilitates one-to-one funds transfer.
option4: Only bank branches which are NEFT enabled, can be a part of the NEFT funds transfer network.
explanation: RBI announced that additional 11 settlement batches at half- hourly intervals will be introduced from July 10 2017 , beginning from 8.30 am till 6.30 pm. With this, the total number of half hourly settlement batches during the day will increase to 23.
